Content: Yeah, I'll get right on that. I bet a OpenGL engine will just _fly_ in JavaScript. And of course, all browsers give the JS runtime full access to the video hardware.

Content: I'm going through this over the weekend. The really trippy part, to me, is where he switches from using haskell to define the scheme parser, to using scheme to define the standard library (of course, run through the parser that was just written)
